wikipedia_page.main: Davie Johnston (born 29 February 1948) is a Scottish footballer, who played for Dundee and Montrose.

response: * Davie Johnston (footballer, born 1942) (1942–2004), Scottish footballer, played for Heart of Midlothian FC and Aberdeen FC
* Davie Johnston (footballer, born 1948), Scottish footballer, played for Dundee FC
